titles.title: Hospital Indigent Care Relief Act of 2000
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to increase the percent of hospital bad debt that is reimbursable under the Medicare Program.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 7/18/2000--Introduced. Hospital Indigent Care Relief Act of 2000 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to increase the percent of hospital bad debt that is reimbursable under the Medicare program.
